commit-message.prompt: Suggest an informative commit message by summarizing code changes from the shared command output. The commit message should follow the conventional commit format and provide meaningful context for future readers

fundoc.prompt: document the function briefly explained without including Args: and Returns: in the documentation and place it below the function definition in the code and the docstring and everything inside the function should be indented with 4 spaces more than the function definition

classdoc.prompt: document the class very briefly and return the docstring only and don't add new line after the docstring and place it before the class definition

document.prompt: document every function and every class in the selection. add a module level documentation at the top of the file

annotate.prompt: add type annotations to every datatype
